name: Box Shooter (Nehal_V)
description:
is a 2D survival shooter game. Here you play as a 2D Gray scale box and kill all RGB 2D box.
Just Survive the Game with different maps forest,snow and desert. several guns and different positions and trophies that will make you stronger tnx and have fun #survival #platformer #shooter #action #arcade #2d #cubegame #xd #owo #fortnite#space #endless #unity #puzzle #retro #cube #dev
